dublin_core.dcvalue: Motor vehicle accidents are one of the major causes of injury in most motorized countries Driver distractions have been suggested as a contributor to traffic accidents Moreover age of the driver seems to have a role in the relationship between distractions and car crashes But very few studies have investigated the effect of driver s age on this relationship This exploratory study investigated the association between distractions both inside and outside the vehicle and the increased risk of car crash injury among drivers across different ages
Distractions and the risk of car crash injury: the effect of drivers' age.
